about_the_game:
Introduction to Click and Tits 3:

Click and Tits 3 is an engaging game that immerses you in a sexy and exciting world, where each stage of your progression unlocks erotic visual content. Designed for an adult audience, the game features explicit scenes, images, animations, and videos that you gradually unlock as you advance.

From the very beginning, players have access to erotic content, and with each level, the interactions and visuals become progressively more daring. The game blends sleek design with alluring characters to deliver a unique and immersive experience.

Key Features:

  • Evolving content: Gradually unlock images, animations, and erotic videos as you progress through the game.

  • Diverse characters: Meet a variety of seductive characters with unique appearances and personalities.

  • Immersive experience: Enjoy an intuitive interface and smooth gameplay designed for total immersion in the game’s world.

  • Explicit scenes: For an adult audience, featuring nudity and detailed sexual interactions, accessible as you advance through levels.

  • Sophisticated aesthetics: High-quality graphics and visual design that create a sexy and captivating atmosphere.

Click and Tits 3 is perfect for those seeking a fun, visually stimulating experience with erotic rewards at every stage. Enjoy the escalating intensity as you unlock exclusive content!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains sexual content, including explicit images, animations, and videos. The content featured in the game includes nudity as well as sexual interactions between characters. Some scenes may contain explicit situations that may not be suitable for a younger audience or sensitive individuals.

name: Click and Tits 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card or onboard chipset

reviews:
“The choices you make have a real impact on the story. I can’t wait to play again to see the other possibilities!”
5/5 – Alex

“Click and Tits 3 has exceeded all my expectations. It's by far the best in the series, a true masterpiece!”
5/5 – Mrjzargo

“I adore all the little details and easter eggs hidden everywhere. It really makes you want to explore every nook and cranny!”
4,8/5 – Kraska Prod
short_description: Click and Tits 3 is an adult game that combines seductive visuals with an immersive experience. Unlock erotic scenes and animations as you progress through the game, with increasingly explicit content at each level. It offers a visually stimulating and captivating experience.
